messages.title: STRONG LOCAL VOICE
messages.content: Alan has been working hard for the constituency. From RAF Cottesmore to local schools and hospitals, from HMP Ashwell to fighting an inappropriate phone mast in Meon. Alan has fought to make sure the voice of his constituents is heard.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Gordon Brown owes the people of the constituency one of the best pension deals in the world, the forty year fight against Conservative social and financial poverty. Alan has campaigned for a fair deal for the elderly, ensuring that those who lost out, will get a fairer life.

Afghanistan is so close RAF Cottesmore and Alan know what it means to ask our Armed Forces to do their duty. If Alan has his way, Gordon Brown will be forced to spend a larger share of the nationâ€™s finances on getting the wars without the money to pay for them.
